snippet.title: Wangan Trial Love [湾岸トライアルＬＯＶＥ♥] Game Sample - Sega Saturn
snippet.description:
Original Air Date: January 10th, 2009

This video is for Wangan Trial Love, which is like the Wangan driving games with a load of dating-sim elements thrown in. I don't think either portion is particularly great though. The game is painfully slow in its pace and the driving portion is in a lot of ways worse than the other Wangan games. The sim portion is moderately thought out, right down to making your own schedules and daily routines, but the game as a whole could have used a little more fine tuning.

I suppose the game is pretty good once you spend millions of yen on a fancy car and the ladies, but that's assuming you can put up with hours of tedious micro-management and difficult tasks to make money, not to mention karts and cars that control terribly. The game also has mini-games. Watch for yourself and decide whether or not it's something you're into. Enjoy.

Note: This is a yellow-label Saturn game recorded off of the original hardware. Yellow label games usually contain suggestive themes. The thumbs for this video suck this time around too... I wish regular users could choose their own thumbs.

- ADDITION -
